food.question: I am yellow and you peel me. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I? üçå

hints.text: I grow on trees!
I'm long and curved.
You say 'buh-nana' when you say my name.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I? üçé

hints.text: I can be green or yellow too!
Snow White likes me.
Crunch, crunch!

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I? ü•ï

hints.text: I grow underground.
You can eat me raw or cooked.
I help you see better.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You drink me. What am I? ü•õ

hints.text: I am good for your bones.
I am yummy with cookies.

food.question: I am small and green and grow in a pod. What am I? üü¢

hints.text: I am a vegetable.
I roll around on your plate.

food.question: I am a sweet treat, made of chocolate and sometimes have nuts. What am I? üç´

hints.text: I can be in a bar.

Kids love me, but too much isn't good.

food.question: I am round, flat, and you put toppings on me. You bake me in the oven. What am I? üçï

hints.text: I have a crust.
I am often cut into triangles.

food.question: I am made from wheat and come in many shapes. You boil me in water to cook me. What am I? üçù

hints.text: I can be long and stringy, or short and curvy.
You eat me with a fork.
I go well with sauce.

food.question: I am a berry that is small, blue and sweet. What am I? ü´ê

hints.text: I grow on bushes.
I am good in muffins.

food.question: I am made from corn, and I pop when heated. You eat me at the movies. What am I? üçø

hints.text: I am white or yellow.
I make a popping sound!
You often put butter and salt on me.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you need an umbrella! What am I? ‚òî

hints.text: It makes puddles!
Plants like to drink me.
Drip, drop, drip, drop!

weather.question: I'm big and yellow and shine in the sky. I make you warm! What am I? ‚òÄÔ∏è

hints.text: I come out during the day.
I help flowers grow.

weather.question: I'm white and fluffy and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain! What am I? ‚òÅÔ∏è

hints.text: Birds fly around me.
I can look like a sheep.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I? ‚ùÑÔ∏è

hints.text: You can make a snowman with me.
I am frozen water.

weather.question: I blow in the sky, and I can move your hair! What am I? üå¨Ô∏è

hints.text: Kites like me.
I'm invisible.

weather.question: Sometimes after the rain, I appear with many colors in the sky. What am I? üåà

hints.text: I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I am loud and bright, and I come with thunder during a storm! What am I? ‚ö°

hints.text: I can light up the sky.

weather.question: After the rain, the sun may come out and dry the puddles. What made them disappear?

hints.text: The water goes up into the air.
It's a process called _________.
The sun helps water turn into a gas.

weather.question: Sometimes the wind can be so strong it forms into a twisting column. What am I? üå™Ô∏è

hints.text: I can pick things up and spin them around.

weather.question: When the air outside is very cold, water can freeze into tiny crystals in the air. What does this create?

hints.text: Sometimes you can't see very far.
It is similar to a cloud, but near the ground
It reduces visibility
